about.brief_profile: Jason develops and applies tools to study the structural connections of the brain. His primary research focus is on the short-ranged, "U"-shaped connections that join nearby brain regions. He is also a supporter of open science and all things open source.
about.polaroid_caption: In his spare time, Jason enjoys discovering new places and taking in the scenic views
about.code_caption: Jason makes use of different programming languages & software containers for project development and continuous deployment
about.research_caption: Magnetic resonance imaging is one of the tools utilized in Jason's research, acquiring data to study the brain's structural connectivity
